Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Looks like our answer is just behind this door.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Are we ready?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'If we help you get the hidden data inside this disc, will WGAA reward us for it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'First of all, at least you all had some fun while Babylonia was baking in the deadly heat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "As for the reward, I can give you the public access key to the first two levels of the Golden Age database's video game section.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Public access?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'There was never a "regular" access key, because Allen thought it wasn\'t necessary.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'What do you say, Gray Raven?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're already here. Of course we will stay till the end.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'At least... We have something to do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We have already come this far. At least I want to figure out what it is before breaking it apart.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So I take it as you all have no problem. Is that right?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory57.jpg'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Once again, you wake up from darkness.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'There is neither confrontation like The Darkening, nor being trapped like The White Owl.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'By the way, in case you are curious, the last movie was "Halloween Homecoming."'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'It was a low-cost horror comedy mocking on "Halloween Slaughter." Don\'t underestimate it though, for it had single-handedly transcended the movie genre.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: '...Forget about it. You are now inside an old mansion. It is fabulously decorated, but somewhat lacks vitality.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'This place looks so much like my old home...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You are standing in a corridor of the mansion. There are a few rooms located on both sides, but their doors are all closed.'}
{3: 'Before the narrator can finish, Kamui reaches for one of the doors.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'When in doubt, just be bold.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui pushes the door open with great force, only to find endless darkness on the other side, vaster than he can ever imagine.'}
{3: 'Having used too much force, Kamui loses balance and is about to fall over—'}
{3: "—Fortunately, Lucia reaches out and grabs Kamui's other hand."}
{3: 'She pulls him back.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '...Phew, lucky! Thanks, Lucia!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't run around. Based on previous experiences, this world should also belong to some horror movie.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Yeah, and I'm actually quite familiar with this one...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '"The Evil Demon", one of the iconic dark movies, famous for the way it portrayed the lawful evil demons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The demons from hell would pick sinful people and pull them into the space of memories, giving them as much pain and disaster as possible...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'They would then feast on the screams of the victims.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "So I don't think we can apply common sense here, neither should we use sheer force like before...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So we must take caution, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's the only safe way to advance, at least during the first half of the movie.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I see. Let's move with caution.", 4: '2'}
